legal_basis: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, ss. 96 and 97
risk_of_persecution: fear of persecution from a political figure in Mexico
documentary_evidence: insufficient evidence of Mexico’s inability to protect him
reasonableness_standard: Board’s decision was unreasonable due to lack of analysis and disregard for relevant evidence
burden_of_proof: claimant must prove inability or unwillingness of their country to provide protection
